author: Emily Chan For Mailonline
title: Netflix codes to help you watch favourite shows and films | Daily Mail Online
text: Slasher and Serial Killer Movies (8646) Zombie Horror Movies (75405) Soccer Movies (12549) British TV Shows (52117) Some codes may no longer work, as the site is constantly changing. There may also be variations due to regional differences. However, with the thousands of genres on offer, there are plenty to pick from even if some donâ€™t do the trick. Netflix ended 2016 with nearly 94 million subscribers from around the world. An expansion drive has meant that nearly half of Netflix users are now outside the US, a proportion expected to increase as it adds more customers. Netflix ended 2016 with nearly 94 million subscribers. Pictured is CEO Reed Hastings
